successes.title: Through the Breach: A Malifaux Roleplaying Game
successes.description: A story-driven, roleplaying experience set in Wyrd's world of Malifaux.

Pledges.description: CORE SET: Get a retail copy of both the Player's Guide and the Fate Master's Guide.

LIVING ROOM ROLEPLAYER: Get the Player's Guide and the Fate Master's Guide bound together in one beautiful hard-cover, Kickstarter exclusive volume, as well as a Special Edition RPG Fate Deck. Additionally, get copies of the Core Player's Guide and Fate Master's Guide so you can keep your exclusive printing pristine.
DINING ROOM ROLEPLAYER: Get a copy of the Player's Guide, a copy of the Fate Master's Guide, a Male and a Female Multi-pose Mini, and the special edition sculpt of Hannah, Chief Freikorps Archivist.

GAMING ROOM ROLEPLAYER: Get a Kickstarter exclusive hand made Wicked Doll, the Kickstarter exclusive hard-cover volume, the special edition RPG Fate Deck, the Male and Female Multi-pose Minis, Hannah the Freikorps Archivist, and a core copy of both the Player's Guide and the Fate Master's Guide.
